website_summaries.verdict: Soylent meal replacement shakes are shelf-stable for a year, and the flavor is not overpowering or artificial.
pros: True meal replacement, not just high protein
Uses soy isolate protein, not lactose-based
cons: Some users may be sensitive to soy ingredients

customer_reviews.title: TOO Expensive, and Sucralose is bad.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very unique because it has a good amount of calories, and good nutrition as well, which is great. BUT, They care about being vegan, yet waste a bunch of plastic. They care about being healthy, yet use Sucralose. They care about the future and serving to the masses, yet charge at a premium cost. My suggestion is, use 20% real sugar. If more sugar is needed, use organic stevia leaves. Lower the cost. Significantly lower the cost of the powder version. Sell multi serving bottles so less plastic is used. Only use recycled plastic. And, to think outside the box, sell glass bottles in some locations with a bottle filling service at similar cost.
customer_reviews.author: SiwajFam

customer_reviews.title: Great meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: These drinks saved my life while I was on chemo and all I could tolerate was liquids. This helped me not need to get a feeding tube. It tastes great too!
customer_reviews.author: Harley B.

customer_reviews.title: Expired almost a month ago
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because the deal for the 4 packs was good. $2/bottle versus a usual $3/bottle. But when they arrived they were all past their sell-by date.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen DeBussey

customer_reviews.title: Gross, misleading, poor ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: While some may find this product to be a useful diet aide or meal supplement, I found the ingredients to be of poor quality (sunflower oil) and the sucralose is a complete deal killer making this meal replacement taste overly sweet, fake, and left me hungry (I got zero feeling of fullness). I realize product reviews are individualized, and please note that others have given the product good reviews, so it may work well for you. I read the reviews and decided to buy the product. I wish I hadn't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like green.
customer_reviews.text: if you've had other brands of soylent you know what I mean when I say it tastes green. However that said, it's not bad at all. Mildly minty, very filling and gets the job done. I keep a stock of these in my office refrigerator and when I can't make lunch, or am working late but don't want to be tempted to stop off for junk food I grab one. I've found that unlike other drinks of this nature, these actually do leave me full and with out a craving for more food for quite a while afterwards. Totally worth it. when people at work make fun of me I tell them its made from vegetarians, so it's healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Madbunny

customer_reviews.title: Soylent green...is the best flavor yet!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first box of mint chocolate. I’m a cacao and cafe mocha lover, but sometimes the aftertaste of the cacao makes me sip slower or not want to finish an entire bottle. I want the strong flavor of the cafe mocha without the caffeine, so I ordered the mint chocolate! I was skeptical that the mint flavor would come through, but the drink is a great balance of chocolate and mint. The mint is not overpowering, but because of the multidimensional flavor, the drink does not have any chemically aftertaste. In fact, this flavor is perfect for drinking quickly OR sipping for enjoyment. I’m so impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn McArthur

customer_reviews.title: I just couldn't enjoy it like others said in different reviews as a ...
customer_reviews.text: I give this one star because of the taste and the way it made me feel. I just couldn't enjoy it like others said in different reviews as a meal replacement I need something that will at least taste pleasant. also the amount of soy that was contained in it upset my stomach very bad and I was in bed the rest of the day with a stomach ache.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: After reading way too many reviews that raved about this stuff I finally broke down and bought a four pack to try it and all I have to say is "Meh", it's okay. The taste of the cacao flavored shake is... you guessed it- okay. There is absolutely nothing special about it, it tastes like a dozen other protein shakes I've tried before it except this one is super expensive. The best thing about this is the jokes about it being made of people and if you don't get the reference, google that sh*t because it's hilarious.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Moncada

customer_reviews.title: Don’t feel full, didn’t taste great
customer_reviews.text: This was a real miss for me. I have been looking for ways to get in breakfast on the go and had heard good things about Soylent. Unfortunately, it tasted much like other of its kind (that is to say, not very good with a fake-sugar after taste), but even more disappointing is that it didn’t help me feel full at all. I drank it at 10am. It’s 11am and I’m as hungry as when I don’t eat breakfast. At 400 calories, I was hoping it would carry me to the early afternoon. I would rather have a breakfast sanwhich.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Gas!
customer_reviews.text: Gave me awful gas . My brother had this problem also. I really wanted to like this !
customer_reviews.author: BlueJay

customer_reviews.title: More!
customer_reviews.text: Keep the supply coming! Great flavor, nice emergency meal. I like something light for the morning sometimes and this is great. Very filling. Just don't drink too much when you first start out. (Get used to it, and you may realize you are full before you think you are etc.) Only issue is having to wait for resupply.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Did!
customer_reviews.text: To start, I'm new to the meal replacement beverage world. With a fair amount of research, I landed on Soylent - Mint Chocolate. Some of the reviews had me weary to purchase, but I'm so happy I did. The drink itself is delicious. It actually tastes like chocolate milk! Imagine my surprise when I was expecting a chalky, pseudo-chocolate drink! Packaging is wonderful. I love the sealed cap and foil top. Many reviews mentioned the high price point. While I agree it is pricier than some competitors, I'm using this to replace my lunch, so I'm actually saving money, daily. I fully recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty for a meal replacement "shake"
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite meal replacement shakes I have tasted. I have a hard time eating and like that Soylent makes it so easy. You just have to drink a sweet tasting shake! The only downside is it is made with soy, which isn't that good for you in large amounts. I originally bought it for my boyfriend to try and now he can't get enough of it! I had been wanting to try this product for years and am glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B

customer_reviews.title: not that healthy, they're wildly expensive, taste horrible, and gives you stomach issues
customer_reviews.text: Horrendous aftertaste! Every time I consumed one of these... things... I am almost instantly beset with gas and an upset stomach, followed by "the squirts" (as Ron Swanson might say). These things are loaded with sugar and, I can only assume, chalk. They added the care minimum liquid to turn their awful powder into "liquid" form, though it's really more of a blended chalk texture. You can easily make a much healthier version for less than half the price with Garden of Life mix and almond milk. So they're not that healthy, they're wildly expensive, taste horrible, and give you stomach issues. NO THANKS!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Joe

customer_reviews.title: Whoa
customer_reviews.text: Mint chocolate changes everything. Eat something light and have this replace your dessert/snack. Now you can make a meal out of dessert! It' sooo delicious! I don't think I can ever try the other flavors again. Gah! If only it were green; that'd be so fun! Looks like cacao but tastes like a rich, chocolate Andes mint.
customer_reviews.author: MellowJello

customer_reviews.title: One bottle lasts 4-5 hours. Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I started off with the three pack just to make sure that it worked and that I liked the taste. I've now gone on to buying cases and I couldn't be happier. One bottle is more than enough to cover breakfast or lunch easily. I've found that I can drink a bottle and not be hungry for roughly 4-5 hours. Not bad at all and super convenient for those of us who simply don't have the time to stop for a bite to eat in the mornings. If you've been thinking about trying Soylent but haven't done so yet, just do it! You won't be disappointed. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H. Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Cloying artificial taste
customer_reviews.text: The sucralose really leaps to the front of the flavor of this drink and stays in the back of your mouth three or four swallows after the rest of the drink is gone. If I'm going to consume 400 calories of something, I'd rather just drink a quart of whole milk--same calorie count and 60% more protein. Or drink 3 cups of milk with a tablespoon of chocolate syrup; it's got about the same nutritional profile as Soylent Cacao but doesn't taste like you're living in a dystopian post-agricultural future.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect breakfast every weekday for years
customer_reviews.text: Soylent cacao is a staple in my fridge. A few years ago I would consume mostly soylent and then just eat out with friends or catered lunches at work. Now I just have it for breakfast or lunches when I’m too busy, or right before I go on a longer bike ride. For me 400 calories for breakfast is perfect, and I don’t feel weighed down or hungry afterward. The flavor isn’t very strong. I used to add my own chocolate syrup back in the powder days, but the light chocolate flavor is fine. It’s not something to sip and enjoy, chug it and move on with your day.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FLAVOR BUT PRICEY
customer_reviews.text: I love everything mint and this shake hits the mint spot for me. I love that it is plant-based and a meal replacement. The only negative is this 12 pack of 14oz bottles are very pricey even with subscription. If you can routinely afford them, are on the go, I highly recommend the Soylent shakes. I love the mint, but they come in many other flavors or you can order an assortment. Great for the vegan/health-conscious.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Spring

customer_reviews.title: Product is alright at best; MASSIVE stomach aches lately
customer_reviews.text: Been trying Soylent for some time and overall the quality of the shakes have a declined a bit. I've tried every flavor and Chai is the best followed by Cafe Vanilla and Coffiest. After that the rest are mediocre at best having a very chalky taste. If you are looking to lose weight on this you have to avoid eating anything else to effectively lose weight. Lately for some reason I've been getting MASSIVE stomach aches drinking this with some "heavier" side effects. Decided to read what the ingredients were and they are some on there that I don't trust putting into my body. I use to recommend this product but unfortunately not anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hope you like weird smelling toots.
customer_reviews.text: I'm no stranger to Soylent. I like having it around, particularly on mornings where I'm rushed to get out the door to work and don't have as much time to prepare something to eat, or forgot to do overnight oats. It definitely does a decent job in filling in for a meal I would otherwise miss. It... it just makes your flatulence room-clearing in its capabilities, and there seems to be no reprieve from that. Sometimes, the bubbles come, and as they force their way out of you from the rear, it produces a particularly foul stench, worse so than the night you spent at the Everything's Cabbage! buffet. Is it worth the tradeoff? ... Mostly.
customer_reviews.author: Xial

customer_reviews.title: Suspicious taste, broken trust.
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this Cocoa flavor forever, and it always had a consistent taste. In most recent box... the contents of the first bottle had this ripe smell... I drank a little of it anyway... and from a second bottle, which unfortunately had the same smell/taste... expiration date says August 2020, which is almost a year away. I might pay for this mistake soon in the bathroom. Hopefully it's not poisonous. Either way... this kind of "bad batch" is not acceptable. Who knows what other contaminants or anti-sanitary treatment they had before, which didn't alter the taste? I cannot trust this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksey

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. I suffer from severe chronic migraines and have a seizure disorder. Low blood sugar can cause seizures, but I can't always keep food down when I have a migraine. It also makes it hard to get all of the nutrients I need. Soylent has really helped. The cacao flavor is great. It's not too sweet and it doesn't have a weird aftertaste. It's also not too thick or gritty. The only thing I dislike is how much it costs
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great Meal Replacement
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product in the past as an alternative to skipping breakfast. I’m an adult and recently had the dreaded adult braces put on. It’s been a couple of days and the pain and discomfort of eating has made me completely lose my appetite. So glad I have these to turn to until the pain subsides. I love the chocolate flavor most but the chai is decent and has caffeine in it so I prefer it in the morning. I would give 5 stars but the price is a bit ridiculous and it makes no sense that there is no discount for getting a 12 pack vs singles.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Drake

customer_reviews.title: I love it (lost more than 30 pounds
customer_reviews.text: Drinking it twice a day for almost 3 months and I have lost of weight almost as I did when I was in my twenty’s. The cacao is awesome tasts just like chocolate great stuff no exercising nothing for me any way. Not long after starting the soylent I was diagnosed with Diabetes well a very high glucose 360 something. So good thing I lost the weight. So anyway once glucose under control which should be easier now I lost so much weight. I can say for me even though it is a little pricey works great and again it works great for me I cannot speak for someone else, but it would not hurt to try.
customer_reviews.author: Michael l

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting with high price tag...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting soylent among all the ones I’ve tried. The problems are, however, price and amount. Somehow this doesn’t keep me as full as the original... this might be a result of the sweet tasting. And maybe because this is so popular, it tends to be more expensive comparing to other flavors.... Also, my partner notices there’s some string-like residue every time when he drinks this.. he’s not sure what it is but suspecting it might be where the nutrition is added. This would be perfect if the price is not so high.
customer_reviews.author: Shandy

customer_reviews.title: Different from Grocery Store Product
customer_reviews.text: I started the subscription after loving the Soylent product from the grocery store, hoping that it would make it easier than filling up the shopping cart every time. The bottles that came are clearly a lower quality in production, there is no foil cover, just a twist cap; the cap leaves little plastic bits all over the mouth of the bottle, and there is gross solidified Soylent at the top as well. On top of everything else, the flavor is different, maybe from being stored improperly? I cannot recommend this product, but I do highly recommend the Soylent in the round bottles! Now I just have to power through 24 bottles of this... 😑
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: 20% nutrition claim is a ad lie. It does not contain enough fiber.
customer_reviews.text: All in the title. You can easily validate it on the bottle screenshots right there. If you replace most of your meals with this version of Soylent, you will only get 60% of the recommended daily amount of fiber. Many also mention suclarose being bad for health. Manufacturer could definitely replace it with something better. I'd actually prefer artificial sweetener and calories from another source (e.g. not carbohydrates). But, it might still be a step up from really greasy diets, and the taste is really good for something you can pop and consume in a second.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Milovanov

customer_reviews.title: Like Chocolate Milk!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes like a light and refreshing chocolate milk without the stomach gurgles from lactose. My only thing is that it’s not really chocolate “mint” (I was looking forward to it tasting like a true minty chocolate but the mint part is so bare, I can hardly taste it). Still good though, I’d probably get it again. I haven’t gotten Soylent in ages so I like the bottle upgrade and the freshness seal. Staves off the hunger for sure. Also on super hungry-days, this takes the edge off so I don’t make crappy choices. :)
customer_reviews.author: G. Gables

customer_reviews.title: decent product, especially if you want to gain weight
customer_reviews.text: my weight has always been stable until i started drinking this. it simplified my routine which was immensely helpful since i was traveling a lot. i didn't get a lot of exercise during this time but have gone through periods of low exercise before without weight gain. I gained 15-20 lbs in 2 months and it took way longer to lose it again. i wish i could use this product because it was super convenient and the chocolate one tasted pretty good, but i donated my bigger clothes and can't afford to replace my wardrobe again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste & Very Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Good if you're in a hurry or suffering from lack of appetite! Chocolate is the best flavor, hands down. There is an adjustment period of 1-2 weeks, where you may experience some upset stomach, bloating or gas. To avoid or lessen this sip slowly when you first start drinking so your stomach can get used to it and drink plenty of water! Lots of debate of the soy protein isolate - I am soy intolerant and find that I can tolerate it when I need it, /*sup developers*/ but the adjustment period is rougher for me than my friend who isn't intolerant. Hoping a premade alternative comes out with pea or oat instead of soy. :)
customer_reviews.author: don't-panic-42

customer_reviews.title: Interesting Taste
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several of these oddly named Soylent meal replacements. This Mint Chocolate does taste like you'd expect: like melted (but not too sweet) iced cream. It's rare to see this flavor in a meal shake, so it's a nice option. It held me over for four hours easy and made a good quick lunch. The only things that holds this back is the high cost. At nearly $3.50 per bottle it's a pricier option and the nine grams of sugar is higher than a lot of shakes now that Keto is so popular. But it's worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: AshertopiA

customer_reviews.title: New bottle is awful and has SHARP EDGES!
customer_reviews.text: I love the soylent flavor and it is filling! Fantastic meal replacement. However, they switched to a new bottle and it is making me want to switch. There is a super sharp edge inside that catches your lips, the glossy cheap outside makes it hard to unscrew the cap. I will never understand why companies make twist off caps surrounded by a second layer of slippery plastic...Why the switch? the original bottles were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Adam S. Walter

customer_reviews.title: Save time and energy for breakfast.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 4 boxes of this flavor. Love it! Very convenient for breakfast. Don’t need to think what to have for breakfast. Save time and save energy. This flavor didn’t label whether it contains caffeine so I think it doesn’t. I was worried about that it’s GMO. I read their website they explained why. So I’m not too concerned about that. But I still prefer non-GMO. Tried other flavors before but like this one the best.
customer_reviews.author: Randy S

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate milk, but with everything you need in a meal
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! It tastes like chocolate milk, just a bit thicker. I would have expected it to have a strange flavor due to all the protein, vitamins, etc. contained within, but I am not getting that. While intended as a meal replacement, I sometimes drink a Soylent just to ensure that I am getting some of everything I need for the day. Even if the rest of my meals are less healthy, 20% of everything important is much better than none. My 3-yr-old daughter loves this stuff, but we usually give her the strawberry flavor as it is not as favored by the adults.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good!
customer_reviews.text: Due to stress in my life I haven’t had much appetite lately. I decided to try Soylent to supplement what little I was eating. I chose the chocolate flavor. I’m surprised at how much I like it, and how I can get it down even when I have no appetite. I add a little black coffee and milk which I think makes it more palatable and gives it a better (thinner) texture. I wish they didn’t use so much plastic - maybe offer it in glass bottles or larger, multi-serving bottles? I also wish it were less expensive...
customer_reviews.author: Susan Tyler

customer_reviews.title: EXPIRED
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try these and they got here today with an expiration date of June 2019 and its almost February of 2020...so disappointed to receive an item that's so expired
customer_reviews.author: Aislinn

customer_reviews.title: Some are tolerable, but this is the only flavor that's good.
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY a Soylent flavor that isn't awful! The Chocolate Soylent was awful and I'm glad they didn't use that as a base flavor. We make people drink Birthday Cake flavor ON A DARE, and they rarely succeed, it's so gross. Mint Chocolate Soylent is finally actually tasty instead of tolerable. It does, of course taste like a meal replacement shake, but it's greatly improved with this Soylent flavor.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mudge

customer_reviews.title: Sucralose, gross
customer_reviews.text: I’m so upset at myself for not catching that this has sucralose in it. It’s so disgusting, I can’t finish even a few sips before giving up. Damn me for spending $40 on something I can’t actually use :(
customer_reviews.author: Lauren G

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting and Good Protein Shake
customer_reviews.text: I got this to try to see if it would help me with my diet and health etc since I’ve been trying to eat healthier and am lactose intolerant. This doesn’t cause me problems as far as when I drink milk it does and it helps me not eat as much unhealthy foods and cut back on snacking etc. If I go very long without using this then I notice a difference in my eating that isn’t as healthy or good as when I do use this. If you’re looking for a good lactose free protein shake this is definitely a good one to use.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: A haiku to honor our beloved Soylent
customer_reviews.text: Soylent we all hail. Soylent tastes better than kale. Soylent go on sale! Cacao flavored Soylent is one of the best tasting meal replacers on the market. I don't drink it and feel full because I'm a food monster, but I will choose Soylent over a salad any day of the week! I do wish it were cheaper though because I can only stock up when it's on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Garner

customer_reviews.title: Unfullfilling
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try these as a replacement for my Ensure plus Chocolate flavor, because I read these was a more "healthy" alternative. I'm glad I only bought a package of 4 instead of a bigger box. The texture is too liquid, the flavor is almost non-existent, and I end up hungry after drinking one bottle (and I drink this as my dessert, meaning I already had my meal). I will switch again to ensure.
customer_reviews.author: A.p.

customer_reviews.title: Upset stomach
customer_reviews.text: Upset my stomach, may be just me. Also did not quench any hunger I personally don't recommend to replace a meal.
customer_reviews.author: Robb J Whizz

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: The Cacao flavor reminds me of chocolate soy milk. It was enjoyable and certainly helped stave off hunger for hours! I started replacing breakfast with this and did so for a week. That worked out well, since I generally don't end up getting breakfast and just have an early lunch. I do wish that they were available in stores near me so I could buy individual bottles, but some day I'll be able to afford to get a case every so often. It didn't cause any of the problems with gas or an upset stomach that I was initially concerned about, which was a pleasant surprise as well. Love the product and the design!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Needham

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great and keeps you full.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a picky eater and I usually don’t like the grittiness or after taste of meal replacement shakes/nutrition shakes. This is amazing! Great flavor, has some sweetness but not overly sweet. It’s smooth with no weird after taste. The Cacoa is my favorite flavor for the non-caffeinated ones. The original is tolerable but very bland, which some people like, it’s worth a try. The vanilla and strawberry are my second favorite after the cacoa. I’d recommend buying a single one of the flavor that sounds most appealing or getting a variety pack to try them out.
customer_reviews.author: Who's That?

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: It's quite expensive but I guess this is to be expected from a meal replacement product. It doesn't seem to digest well without taking digestive enzymes. It caused me slightly upset stomach and even diarrhea. I'm not really sure about this product. I wish there were more affordable meal replacements out there that actually have fat in it for people like me who need to gain weight. That's why I gave this product a try. It has a decent fat percentage.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Soot

customer_reviews.title: 9 grams of sugar and artificial sweeteners! whyyyy
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these thinking that they didn't have artificial sweeteners because they have 9 grams of sugar, they aren't that sweet so I bought it, after learning that they have artificial sweeteners such as Sucralose I am dumbfounded why they would have 9 grams of sugar, why not just have 1-2 grams and use more sucralose, You use one or the other, but don't mix the bad and bad! 2 star review, and I will not order it again asn Sucralose potentially causes Cancer. It does in Mice in large doses.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Ford

customer_reviews.title: I got sick
customer_reviews.text: I usually drink super fuel from super body fuel but wanted to give this stuff a try. After drinking 14 in total I noticed a had a lot less energy, stomach felt really bad after drinking it and I overall just felt weak. The ingredients in this stuff really just aren't great for you. Liquid diets are getting more attention but I'd recommend either super body fuel or huel.huel costs more and is premade and much healthier. Super body fuel isn't premade it's a powder but cheaper and also much healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: I'm now a believer
customer_reviews.text: As someone who skips meals (whether by accident or not) I figured there's no harm in trying these out and seeing if they can help me out. If these can hold me off until I can get a real meal then I consider that mission successful. I initially thought I'd be trying to choke these down but... they're actually REALLY good! I'd drink one for a snack! Nice little tinge of sweetness is all it needs really and I'm excited to have more throughout the week.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Good taste, pretty filling, and not too sweet
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying Soylent (went with Cacao flavor) and so far, I love it! The aftertaste is nowhere near as bad as other products (especially low-sugar beverages like Muscle Milk). I noticed a slight hint of a chalky aftertaste, but it's completely tolerable given the nutritional punch this drink has. Overall, the flavor is great, but it seems best when consumed very cold. I like that it's not too sweet, that it has a wide array of nutrients compared to common protein drinks, and seems to fit the bill as a genuine meal replacement. Great for busy days at work until I can finally eat something substantial (No, I won't be living off of Soylent alone).
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: damaged food is dangerous and disapointing
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time this product was delivered to our house in unusual packaging. each bottle was wrapped in bubble wrap and each bottle has a dent like it was run over by a truck possibly damaging the seal on this product which is food and making it dangerous to drink. The beverage tasted "funny". I am disappointed that this product was delivered in unique packaging and that it was damaged. again this is the second time. I have cancelled our monthlyh subscription and would like my money back. you can have your damaged food back.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Do it for the ease of use
customer_reviews.text: The shake is actually kinda tasty. I'm not overweight but sometimes I feel a little weighed down by holiday feasting. I replaced breakfast and lunch with a shake for a week and was able to drop about 8 lbs (keep in mind that my weight fluctuates a lot and this is not far from normal) in a week. I ordered anither case just to keep on hand for days that I can't get a decent meal in. Not a bad idea to use it as a crash diet before a beach vacation either.
customer_reviews.author: juan serrano

customer_reviews.title: Revised bottles are awful
customer_reviews.text: The product is quite good, though you need to watch your soy intake. The Cacao flavor is excellent. I like the texture, flavor, and how sweet it is. The low glycemic index is really great. Soylent is relentless with package revision. All older bottles, while sometimes poorly produced, were fine. All of them. The newer round bottles are absolutely awful. They no longer fit in the space my refrigerator I have allocated to them. I absolutely hate this.
customer_reviews.author: Trash Boat

customer_reviews.title: Can't get past the unpleasant taste
customer_reviews.text: I tried one bottle of the Cacao flavor. It had a chalky texture. The taste was not great, but it got worse in the aftertaste - very bitter. Kind of tastes like when I've had something with too much artificial sweetener. I still can't get the taste out of my mouth after eating half of a chicken salad sandwich, which I just bought for lunch because I couldn't finish the Soylent. I've emailed Amazon Customer Service to see if I can possibly return the remaining 11 bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Jahn

customer_reviews.title: Best Soylent option for me!
customer_reviews.text: 80 calories less than the 'normal' bottles... same great flavor... easier to open... and less expensive! Pretty sure these tetra-packs are more readily recyclable too, which is a nice plus. The cacao flavor was already my favorite, so this is my new goto Soylent. Yum!
customer_reviews.author: John A. Mickus

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO SWEET
customer_reviews.text: The flavor over all is ok, it's the right kind of mint - ice cream minty, not toothpaste minty - with a hint of chocolate to mask/complement the "earthy" taste of the base, but omg is it sweet. I wish they'd come out with a version that was at least half as sweet. I know I'd buy a lot more if it didn't taste like drinking syrup.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: good supplement for lunch, especially during COVID-19
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this product and have been ordering lots of it lately. it's a great way to grab a quick lunch on the road or on the go. now that it's COVID-19 shopping, it has become much more convenient. as a sidenote don't order this product with any other products to be shipped at the same time. it's large and heavy and smashes everything else in the box including the packing.
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: Lactose free, and yet...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because they came highly recommended. The flavor isn't bad. I loved the chocolate flavor. Drank these for about a month, but began to notice extreme nausea. Mind you, I ate food with these. I'd drink it with some fruit in the morning and during work on break. Began to get very nauseated and would vomit after trying to hold it down. Figured it had lactose in it (I'm lactose intolerant), except it was advertised as dairy free. Still couldn't figure out what it was, gave the rest to mom and she had no problems. Probably just me, so I won't be purchasing anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Y

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly upset stomach
customer_reviews.text: Was able to isolate it to the Soylent, and each time I had an incredibly upset stomach. I would have liked the product overall, but absolutely not worth the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Christine B

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointedfor all the dumbest reasons
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I drink soylent every morning for breakfast, almost traditionally for the past year. I have always gotten the same flavor, but this packaging is a first for me. I drink it while driving to work, and the plastic seal on the cap it frustrating to take off, and the actual "nozzle" where you place your mouth to drink is sharp and also annoying to use. I love this drink, and I gave this packaging a try, but the bottle design as asinine and got me to write this review. If you want this, I would recommend the older packaging models, or simply the powder to shake your own drink
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big Improvement over Cocao
customer_reviews.text: I personally find Cacao to be too sweet (too artificially sweet, specifically). Mint Chocolate still has an initial hit of the very sweet taste, but the mint chases it quickly to mellow it. Because this product fixes 80% of the problems with the Cacao flavor I'm giving it 4 stars. If they could tone down that initial sweetness hit it would be 5. But as with all Soylent flavors, YMMV. No-one *loves* any Soylent flavor, but this is one of the only 3 flavors I can personally drink repeatedly (Cafe Mocha & Original being the other 2).
customer_reviews.author: Adam Black

customer_reviews.title: worst "chocolate" flavor I've ever had in a food product
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate flavor is way off. Too sweet for one. They definitely needed to spend more time developing the flavor before releasing the product. The normal soylent 2.0 (which tastes like the milk after eating a bowl of cheerios) is a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting meal replacement drink
customer_reviews.text: I admit I was hesitant to try this product because I had purchased the Soylent powder previously and I couldn’t stomach it. The taste and texture were kind of gross. But after I read so many positive reviews in reference to the the cacao flavor, I figured I would give it a try. I’m glad I did! The cacao flavor tastes good. I have no problem drinking of these as a meal replacement. It’s so darn convenient to have these in my refrigerator for when I don’t feel like cooking anything (often), or I’m on the run. I definitely recommend the cacao flavor. I can’t say anything about the other flavors, but they are likely pretty good tasting too.
customer_reviews.author: ganymede

customer_reviews.title: Best Flavor among them all
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd year drinking Soylent as breakfast every day, and I've tried all the flavors. Let me make this clear, I hate the "mint and chocolate Ice Creams" due to the chocolate chips hid within it, BUT this new Soylent flavor brightened up my mornings! This is by far the best Soylent Flavor for me, I love it so much! it gives a fresh in mouth sensation and packed mint and chocolate flavor.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Contains Sucralose....Need I say more?
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this drink not serve it's purpose of making you feel full...but if you react bad to artificial sweeteners such as Sucralose, then this drink is definitely not for you. It will mess up your digestive system in that case. Nuff said.
customer_reviews.author: *~*Virginia*~*

customer_reviews.title: Now part of my normal diet
customer_reviews.text: When I first tasted it I didn't think it was good as the chocolate, but it grew on me by the end of my first box. Now it's part of my regular rotation. I have a bottle of Soylent for breakfast most days, and it's great. It's not a replacement for everything or a miracle by any stretch, but it's significantly better than my previously normal breakfasts of just carbs or nothing. I will say though that it has helped with some things, probably deficiencies in some micronutrients I had, and it helps with my bike commutes.
customer_reviews.author: J. W.

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate
customer_reviews.text: It almost tastes like chocolate EnSure but at the same time not really. First bottle did not go down smoothly. The flavor was a bit hard for me to understand. Second & third bottle were much better. Acquired taste for sure but will not disappoint if you give it a chance. After I’ve had one bottle I can go four hours without feeling hungry so it does what it says it does. It replaces a meal. I am looking forward to trying the other flavors!
customer_reviews.author: Double L

customer_reviews.title: Good taste and keeps me full
customer_reviews.text: First time ordering this product and so far I like it. It tastes like a normal meal replacement or protein shake in my opinion or maybe I just never have high expectations when it comes to flavor in “healthy” options. It’s does keep me full for a good amount of time with lots of water and healthy snacks. I only have one a day but so far it does seem to be curbing my appetite and cravings etc. It does not upset my stomach or anything but I also already eat a pretty light/balanced diet. It’s worth a try if you’re looking for something to have while on the go, before workouts or at work for convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Jamila

customer_reviews.title: Tastes delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Reminds me of drinking chocolate milk (with a minty good-ness of course). I was expecting the mint chocolate flavor to be more or less layered on top in an effort to hide the soylent flavor (which by the way I find fairly likable by itself), however it actually blends very well and really tastes like you're drinking a treat rather than a meal replacement. To make it better I'd prefer a touch less sweetness (I'm not really a sweets guy), but given that I think most people will probably enjoy the level of sweetness. Side Note: Very good mixed with some cold brew in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Genetically Engineered, has sucralose
customer_reviews.text: No where on the amazon website description can you see that this is a genetically engineered product. Maybe if I had enlarged the font I would have seen it has sucralose. The ingredients list is so tiny on the bottles it is difficult to read. Sucralose is known to cause asthma flares in sensitive individuals. It would be nice to know what ingredients are genetically engineered. The cocoa flavor is palatable but not the most chocolate like flavor. It will help fill you up but wouldn't recommend to diabetics.
customer_reviews.author: RKg

customer_reviews.title: The First one tasted like those "nutri slim" type powered drinks and wasn't a ...
customer_reviews.text: The First one tasted like those "nutri slim" type powered drinks and wasn't a fan.. but I let them chill for a couple days and tried it again. They do test much better chilled for a couple days. So, if you drink one right away it might not taste that great. Give it a go in a day or 2 after being in the fridge. They do taste much better the longer they are chilled. So, just some advise. But, overall it's a great way to get to work whilst passing McDonalds, etc and It pulls double duty fills you up a bit and gets rid of that thirsty feeling in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: TrendKillGaming

customer_reviews.title: Soy is bad for women's reproductive health apparently
customer_reviews.text: So, the product was fine. The packaging was fine. It taste good but this gave me cramps... like in my reproductive area... cramps that mimicked the worst period cramps of my life. I thought my birth control was responsible but then I realized I was only having them in the morning, after I drake soylent. The cramos would last for hours. Effected my back anf hips too. They went away when I stopped drinking these. I drink Walmart brand now. Cheaper and taste better with the same meal replacement benefits. No soy. I'd recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and satisfying
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and satisfying...what more could you ask from a meal replacement beverage? I'd happily drink two of these at a sitting if they weren't so bloody expensive, but I have no complaints about the price considering the obvious care that went into formulating this product. The first few times I drank these on a regular basis (breakfast and lunch, lunch and dinner, etc) I had some mild bloating but that could entirely be a consequence of my own particular metabolism. If you're stretched for time and need to get some calories in you, Soylent is a great way to go.
customer_reviews.author: redjellydonut

customer_reviews.title: Already good, got better with the new Optimized version
customer_reviews.text: This had already become my favorite Soylent flavor, dethroning Cacao, and with the new Soylent Optimized version (almost all flavors have switched, it's got less sugar, but the flavors are actually richer) is even better. Previously, I described it as being almost like sugar-free mint chocolate chip ice cream, but with with the new sweetener and richer flavor, it's almost like drinking and Andes mint. Delicious, balanced, and easy to live with - this is my go-to meal replacement now.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Garris

customer_reviews.title: Even Better Than the Original
customer_reviews.text: I've used their dry mix in the past and actually liked it. However, it is a pain for me to have to mix daily. That being the case, I decided to try all four flavors of the ready mixed product. My least favorite is the coffee flavored one, but I am not a fan of coffee to begin with. That stated, even the coffee flavored one was acceptable to my taste buds. The vanilla and chai are close in how much I like them. That covers all three flavors in the variety pack. I also purchased the cacao pack and it is fairly tasty, too. I will be getting these again. Possibly subscribing to them.
customer_reviews.author: FOSTERBDAV66

customer_reviews.title: Better then not eating or overeating
customer_reviews.text: i work long hours constantly on the go. I often found myself either not eating until I got home at 8pm ( bad) or grabbing something unhealthy just to get something in my stomach. Soylent fills that gap. I have one for breakfast, one for lunch ( or eat a healthy lunch on the weekends) and one for dinner. When I have 2 a day I'm Not as famished when I get home and honestly don't ravage through my fridge or order in. I feel much healthier, have lost a few pounds and have more energy. Wished I could get a case of the strawberry. What's up with that
customer_reviews.author: tt

customer_reviews.title: Truly delicious, convenient, and filling
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised and impressed with how delicious these Soylent cacao bottles are. When chilled, they're refreshing and decadent. They're even more delicious severed at room temperature, where a gulp tastes like a mouthful of the finest melt-in-your-mouth chocolate. The convenience can't be beat. The downside? These things really are irresistible. If you're trying to use them to lose weight, just be aware they are probably more tempting than the chocolate cake in the fridge. So if you find it hard to be near your cravings, consider the dangers of having something so delicious AND convenient in your house all the times.
customer_reviews.author: Tybie Fitzhugh

customer_reviews.title: It weakened my immune system over the course of a year
customer_reviews.text: Over a year ago I started drinking Soylent in the mornings to replace donuts and coffee. Over time I began replacing more meals with it, and sometimes would drink only Soylent for days, because it was so convenient. Over the past year, it hindered my immune system to where I was consistently getting sick and it greatly reduced my tolerance for things like soda (I would get headaches). I assumed it was something else, but then I stopped drinking Soylent a month ago without putting much thought into it. I now feel much, much better. I'm not saying Soylent is bad for everyone, but I'm better off eating donuts.
customer_reviews.author: Morris

customer_reviews.title: Good meal on the go
customer_reviews.text: It took a few tries but I have found that the only Soylent I like is the chocolate flavor. Though I haven't tried them all. This is rather expensive but if you are using it to replace a meal that you would normally eat fast food, it could be worth it. Though at nearly $40 for a 12 pack, it is a pretty steep price to pay. I use it for breakfast, most days. It keeps me full until lunch. I might use it as an in between snack here and there but mostly breakfast. I would suggest throwing a bottle in the freezer until it turns kind of slushy. That is how it tastes best to me but ymmv.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious taste and smooth consistency
customer_reviews.text: If you’re expecting this to taste like a protein shake, you’re wrong. This is a very palatable and enjoyable drink that has the consistency and texture of milk with the taste of chocolate, reminiscent of that from the milk leftover from chocolate cereal. This is really easy to drink and a great option in lieu of lunch or if you need a quick breakfast on the go. I started drinking these this summer and loved them, I’m on probably box number 8 and will continue to keep ordering these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to diet
customer_reviews.text: My son introduced me to Soylent, and I'm glad he did. I'd been using Ensure as a supplement, but after a couple bottles of Soylent Cacao, I've never looked back. It saves money vs. the cafeteria at work for lunch, and on nights when nothing sounds good or I'm just too worn out to cook, I grab a bottle from the fridge. The thicker consistency vs. Ensure makes you feel you're really getting a meal replacement, and the Cacao tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Loaded with Carbohydrates, Low in Substance
customer_reviews.text: This claims it is a protein drink, yet has 37 grams of carbs and 9 grams of added sugar! Touting this as a protein drink is really false advertising, in my opinion, and the 400 calories makes it more than just one meal replacement—it’s about enough for one and a half. Drink these and you’ll be sure to gain weight. The vitamins contained do not justify the calories. It tastes like chocolate milk and propably is about as healthy. It’s not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Christa South

customer_reviews.title: New bottle design is bad
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. However, the design of the new bottles is bad. The inside of the mouth of the bottle hurts if scrap your lips / tongue against it. More importantly, it doesn't stay shut! I just had a bottle open in my lunch, ruining my lunch bag and the carpet in my office. I don't plan on buy this product again unless and until the bottle design gets updated so that it doesn't hurt to drink and won't easily open in my lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Walters

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need it to
customer_reviews.text: Using this to act as breakfast. 400 calories and I feel satiated for much longer than usual buttered toast + milk. Was worried about the taste. Thankfully the taste ranges from mild to good, IMO. It's like an Ensure or other chocolate meal replacements but without the super sweet, lingering aftertaste. Best drank cold. Disappointed that it's gone up in price so much since I bought it. I am giving the powder a shot since it's now even cheaper than the Ready to Drink version.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Great Between-Meal or On-the-Go Meal
customer_reviews.text: I use these on weekdays where my prep hour is really late in the day and there's about five hours between the time that I get to school and the time that I eat. It's really convenient to grab and drink. It's also fairly "inconspicuous" and I never feel strange sipping from one while in a meeting or teaching. However, I usually still feel hungry if it's all that I pack for a lunch. Needs a bit more substance to supplement it if it's the only thing you're eating for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Grace

customer_reviews.title: A great and fast meal option!
customer_reviews.text: This drink tastes so good. I love to drink chocolate protein shakes, slim fast, and muscle milk, so for me, this wasn't a bad taste. It does taste best when its really cold, almost like a melted chocolate milkshake. It can usually hold me over with one for breakfast and another one for lunch during the day. I usually will eat a solid dinner, but I could definitely use this as my meals all day. Its also cheaper than normal food if you calculate each bottle as a meal, so its cost effective too!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Stretch

customer_reviews.title: I will say that it does make it easy to lose weight though as it makes knowing your ...
customer_reviews.text: Soylent is just what it says, a complete meal replacement. It's built specifically to meet all your dietary needs and can be used as your only food intact if you so choose. It's not specifically for weight loss since it also computes in fats and calories for your dietary needs. I will say that it does make it easy to lose weight though as it makes knowing your calorie count pretty simple each day... Surprisingly, you do feel full with these and the eliminate the hassle of fixing a meal when you just don't want to cook.
customer_reviews.author: AndyB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for a meal replacement, convenient too
customer_reviews.text: Simple...easy meal replacement. It's not bad. If you ever as a kid/adult tried brownie mix once the ingredients are mixed together before it was put in the oven. Maybe sneaked a spoon or finger lick from the batter. That's exactly what it taste like. An extremely small after taste u can taste for a second but goes away. To me this product isn't bad. But to each their own... I see it everywhere now...well the other flavors so its getting popular. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nye

customer_reviews.title: Total Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I have an autoimmune disease that requires a lot of medication, and sometimes makes me feel nauseous, but starving at the same time. Soylent is the only thing that has literally kept me alive during those times when I can’t keep much down. I subscribe to the powder jar, as well as the bottled cocao, and I will be a subscriber for life. The cacao reminds me of those ensure drinks, but without all the added sugar or preservatives and gets me through breakfast. I love the neutral flavor as well because I can mix with fruits and veggies to make amazing breakfast smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: The best flavor so far
customer_reviews.text: I liked this flavor better than the other Soylent drinks I have tried. I have to drink protein shakes with fat every day because I need to gain weight and it works for me as Soylent is plant based. I can't tolerate anything dairy bases. All in all a good product. Will probably order this flavor again.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Soot

customer_reviews.title: Short dated item received
customer_reviews.text: *I write this review only to warn others to check the dating on the outside of the box of shakes before you open it.* I ordered a box of 12 shakes on October 13th 2019 only to discover the “Best Buy” date on the item I received is stamped November 2019. I really enjoy the product when I’m in a rush and lack the time to sit for a meal, but sending such a short dated product is really inexcusable. The poor rating reflects the short dating on the box of shakes I received not on the flavor and taste of the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but always raising the price
customer_reviews.text: Soylent is wonderful. It tastes so much better than other drinks like it and is actually filling. But they are seemingly constantly raising the price.... The company’s aim seems to be to help keep a food crisis from forming by offering meal alternatives for an ever growing population. But if it’s never affordable, all you have is a trendy, elite meal shake for people who could afford to eat how ever they wanted anyway. I’m gonna try and keep with it, but these prices may just drive me away.
customer_reviews.author: meow4117

customer_reviews.title: They have all been great flavors and never regretted buying any certain flavor in ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried all Soylent drinks besides the Chai Tea one. They have all been great flavors and never regretted buying any certain flavor in a whole 12 pack. If I had to list them in order of my favorites, it would be: Nectar, Vanilla Cafe, Cacao, Coffiest, Original. EDIT in 2/2020. The Strawberry one was not great at all, but the Mint Chocolate one is actually pretty good, I really like it! Its a shame Nectar is no longer being made after seeing me previous review reminded me it was a good flavor :)
customer_reviews.author: pa 1911 fan

customer_reviews.title: Love the Soylent shakes but the tetra packs had to many chunks for me
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the soylent shakes for years. LOVE them. I gave the smaller tetra packs a try recently and was rather disappointed with how many chunks were in the liquid. I know, I know, shake it well. But I swears I did! I'm going back to the bigger shake packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Provan

customer_reviews.title: Great and healthy product, and I lost weight!
customer_reviews.text: They said this wasn't for weight loss, but I lost 4 lbs on this product. I drank two as meal replacements and then ate what I wanted for dinner. They are chalky, but that is to be expected. Also, watch out for constipation! You are getting a lot of protein and if you are not careful, you'll be sorry!!!!! Will be buying again for quick and healthy meals on the go and for weightloss.......
customer_reviews.author: LINDA DEYARMOND

customer_reviews.title: Packed full of heath and  deliciousness!
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son found these online and requested we order a box. We did. What a big hit for this finicky family! They taste is great, the nutritional content is awesome and being plant based is a big plus. A winner a the way around. We have reordered several time before we decided to take advantage of the price break attached to the subscription service. We love this product.
customer_reviews.author: SpicyKim

customer_reviews.title: My most favorite flavor in the current lineup
customer_reviews.text: My most favorite flavor in the current lineup. I love Soylent! It's a lifesaver, time saver, money saver, etc. My first 10 days I was doing one bottle a day, now I am doing two bottles. It has helped keep me from cheating on my diet and also losing about 3 lbs so far. I hope the company continues to release good flavors, as I only like Cacao and Coffiest. The original flavor is just OK, but would prefer Cacao and Coffiest. Hopefully they make more palette friendly flavors to avoid getting sick of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff T.

customer_reviews.title: A meal replacement that's not full of bologna or loaded with sugar.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a skeptic of meal replacements like this but cacao soylent is actually really effective as one. I've been using it to substitute lunch and it's working out really well, usual lunch offerings (sandwiches, burgers, salad) either leave me feeling like I'm in a food coma or so hungry that I can't work comfortably. Cacao Soylent is like.. a happy medium. Super effective but I can't imagine eating it for every meal. I wish it was more widely available because it would be super easy to just grab one at a gas station or convenience store and get on with whatever you want because you now have your entire lunch break to chill or be productive in your personal life!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flavor wasn’t so bad
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first and got this as a panic but. But honestly, it wasn’t too bad and the chocolate flavor was quite good. Had it for breakfast and didn’t feel as hungry for a while.
customer_reviews.author: YC

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and as advertised. I was extremely surprised at the good taste. I usually don't trust reviews at all because I think a lot of people give "thumbs up" to "healthy" on-the-go snacks/foods despite some of them having an awful taste just because it is a healthier choice. Not the case here. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Allison M.

product_meta.title: Soylent Cacao (Chocolate) Plant Protein Meal Replacement Shake, 14 fl oz, 12 Bottles
product_meta.description: Size:14 Fl Oz (Pack of 12)| Style:ShakeOur classic meal replacement shake gives you the complete nutrition your body needs to thrive. Science-based delicious nutrition with 20g of protein, 39 essential nutrients, 1g sugar and slow burning carbohydrates to keep you fueled up.
feature_bullets: Contains twelve - 14oz bottles of Soylent Plant Protein Meal Replacement Nutrition Shake, packaging may vary.
Complete Nutrition Meal: Science-based nutrition with 20g of protein, 39 essential nutrients, and 1g sugar.
20g of plant based protein: Helps supports lean muscle mass maintenance, muscle recovery and growth, and satiety to keep you going throughout the day.
39 essential nutrients: 28 vitamins & minerals + 9 amino acids + omega-3 + omega-6
Slow-burning carbs: Helps you get full and stay full
No Artificial Flavors or Colors, Vegan, Gluten Free, Nut Free, Kosher

specifications.Domestic Shipping: This item can only be shipped to the 48 contiguous states and to APO/FPO/DPO addresses. For APO/FPO/DPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
